data.eml:eml: A new species of Pimelodella (Siluriformes: Heptapteridae) from the Guiana Shield, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Slobodian, Veronica, Akama, Alberto, Dutra, Guilherme Moreira (2017): A new species of Pimelodella (Siluriformes: Heptapteridae) from the Guiana Shield, Brazil. Zootaxa 4338 (1): 85-100, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4338.1.4
